abstract: The group that the button belongs to.
overview:
## Discussion

This property contains the group to which the item belongs. This property is configured automatically when you add the bar button item to a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItemGroup] object. If the item isn’t associated with a bar button item group, this property is `nil`.

# buttonGroup

**Instance Property**

The group that the button belongs to.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var buttonGroup: UIBarButtonItemGroup? { get }
```

## Discussion

This property contains the group to which the item belongs. This property is configured automatically when you add the bar button item to a [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIBarButtonItemGroup] object. If the item isn’t associated with a bar button item group, this property is `nil`.
title: buttonGroup
